explains: n. 周围地区，邻近地区，附近
wordGroup: in the vicinity of 在…附近；在…上下

sentences.en: There is no hospital in the immediate vicinity.
Only a handful had returned to work in the immediate vicinity.
sentences.cn: 只有少数几个人回到附近地区工作。

sentences.en: There were a hundred or so hotels in the vicinity of the station.
sentences.cn: 在车站附近有大约一百家左右的旅馆。
